verses.roman:
jagannāthera sevaka yata--'viṣayīra gaṇa'
sevā sāri' rātrye kare gṛhete gamana

synonyms: jagannāthera—of Lord Jagannātha; sevaka—servants; yata—all; viṣayīra gaṇa—generally known as viṣayī; sevā sāri'-after finishing their service; rātrye—at night; kare—do; gṛhete gamana—returning home.
translation: After finishing their prescribed duties, the many servants of Lord Jagannātha, who are known as viṣayīs, return home at night.
